title: Feature Unlearning for Generative Models via Implicit Feedback. (arXiv:2303.05699v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: We tackle the problem of feature unlearning from a pretrained image generative model. Unlike a common unlearning task where an unlearning target is a subset of the training set, we aim to unlearn a specific feature, such as hairstyle from facial images, from the pretrained generative models. As the target feature is only presented in a local region of an image, unlearning the entire image from the pretrained model may result in losing other details in the remaining region of the image. To specify which features to unlearn, we develop an implicit feedback mechanism where a user can select images containing the target feature. From the implicit feedback, we identify a latent representation corresponding to the target feature and then use the representation to unlearn the generative model. Our framework is generalizable for the two well-known families of generative models: GANs and VAEs. ret.translated_title: 通过隐式反馈进行生成模型中特征的遗忘
ret.translated_abstract: 我们解决了从预训练的图像生成模型中遗忘特征的问题。与常见的遗忘任务不同，我们的目标是从预训练的生成模型中遗忘特定特征，例如面部图像中的发型。由于目标特征仅出现在图像的局部区域中，因此从预训练模型中删除整个图像可能导致失去图像其余区域中的其他细节。为了指定要遗忘哪些特征，我们开发了一个隐式反馈机制，用户可以选择包含目标特征的图像。通过隐式反馈，我们确定对应于目标特征的潜在表示，然后使用该表示来遗忘生成模型。我们的框架适用于两个着名的生成模型家族：GAN和VAE。通过MNIST和CelebA数据集上的实验，我们展示了成功删除目标特征。
ret.tldr: 本研究开发了一种隐式反馈机制，以确定要遗忘哪些特征，并使用该表示来遗忘生成模型。结果表明成功删除了目标特征。
